Name: Sick Love - An RPG Maker Novel
About the game: A short visual novel about Miguel, a boy whose dream is finding love, Fernando, a boy who seems to be an enchanted prince, and JÃºlio, a young man who falls in love with both of them. Created on 'RPG Maker', you'll watch how these three boys get to know each other, fall in love and how a tragedy marks this unique relationship. Features: A visual novel about the relationship of three young boys; Can be completed in one session (Playtime approximately 20 minutes - including all finals); Four different endings; A game without a fight; Simple and easy gameplay;
